name: Idiots Laughing
description:
In this art game (designed for two people), you learn about how your brain talks to your eyes and your hands. Also, you learn about how big your hands are compared to someone else's hands. Also you learn that WASD is kind of played out, to be quite honest.

Pilot rival ships hunting for asteroids, but ALSO every thirty seconds your input keys will be entirely remapped. Good luck. 

(And for those of you without friends there is definitely a single-player mode, but ugggghhh it's not neaaaarrrrly as fuuuuuunnnn)
